title: Gender potentially affects early postoperative hyponatremia in pituitary adenoma: XGBoost-based predictive modeling

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 7

Author(s): Zheng Peng, Xiao-Jian Li, Yun-feng Wang, Zhuo-Yuan Li, Jie Wang, Chun-Lei Chen, Hui-Ying Yan, Wei Jin, Yue Lu, Zong Zhuang, Chun-Hua Hang, Wei Li
